name: Buffalo Chicken Dip
description: Turn up the heat on game day with this fan-favourite dip! No mess from sticky wingsâ€”just bold flavours ready in a snap using the Rectangular Steamer. For the spice lovers out there, double the Buffalo Seasoning for an extra kick!
preparation: Place chicken in Rectangular Steamer. Coat with 1⁄2 tbsp seasoning. Cover; microwave on high, 4 min. Let rest 1 min before removing lid. Dice or shred chicken.
In Rectangular Steamer (do not wash), combine cream cheese, shredded cheese, dressing, and remaining 1⁄2 tbsp seasoning. Add chicken; stir to combine.
Cover; microwave, on high 3 min, stirring halfway through.
Add toppings, if desired. Serve with crackers or sliced veggies.
tips: Use leftover shredded Rotisserie Chicken or Portuguese Chicken.

products.name: Buffalo Seasoning (1011492)
summary: Feel the heat with this low-sodium, spicy blend that goes way beyond wings!
